DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to test the non-inferiority of the experimental arm compared to the standard arm in terms of progression free survival (PFS).
DOC.brief_title: HD17 for Intermediate Stage Hodgkin Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: Hodgkin Lymphoma CS I, II with risk factor (stage IIB with risk factor 1 or 2 are not included) large mediastinal mass (>1/3 of maximum transverse thorax diameter) extranodal involvement elevated ESR 3 or more involved nodal areas written informed consent Leucocytes <3000/µl Platelets < 100000/µl Hodgkin Lymphoma as composite lymphoma Activity Index (WHO) >2
